Replying to @imanthonyholmes 2019-10-01 18:43
@imanthonyholmes @Netlify The Pro plan has the same build infrastructure as the Starter plan, but you do get support for 3 concurrent builds rather than the 1 you get in the Starter plan. This might result in builds being executed sooner. The Business plan gives dedicated and optimised build infra.
